sentence.Network_en: The most commonly prescribed ovulation drug is clomiphene citrate ( CC ).

sentence.Network_en: Results The ovulation rate reached 87.5 % in the patients with clomiphene - resistant anovulation after the above treatment.

sentence.Network_en: Clomiphene citrate is administered orally while the other medications listed are given by injection.
sentence.Network_cn: 克罗米酚是口服药,而其它都是注射用药.
